CHANGE_PASSWORD.TITLE: Change password
CHANGE_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Use at least 12 characters mixing upper and lower case letters, numbers, and symbols to protect your account.
CHANGE_PASSWORD.MISMATCH_HELPER: The new password and confirmation do not match.

VALIDATION.MISMATCH: New password and confirmation must match.
VALIDATION.INSUFFICIENT_STRENGTH: Use at least 12 characters with letters, numbers, and symbols.

TOAST.ERROR: Failed to update the password. Please try again later.

PASSWORD_STRENGTH.LABEL: Strength indicator
RULES: Includes upper and lower case letters
Includes at least one number and symbol

TOAST.SUCCESS: Other sessions have been signed out.
TOAST.ERROR: Failed to sign out other sessions. Please try again later.

LOGIN_HISTORY.TITLE: Recent sign-in activity
LOGIN_HISTORY.DESCRIPTION: Review sign-in IPs, devices, and results to spot suspicious behavior.

DASHBOARD_VIEW_PAGE.ERROR_NO_ID: No dashboard identifier provided. Please return to the list and select one again.
DASHBOARD_VIEW_PAGE.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: We couldn't find this dashboard. It may have been removed or you may lack access.
DASHBOARD_VIEW_PAGE.ERROR_LOAD: We couldn't load the dashboard data. Please try again later.
